assignment_name: We’re testing… YOUR SKILLS! 😆🔥 - Recursive String Permutations

test_cases.explanation: There are 3! = 6 permutations of the string "abc".
test_cases.expected_output:
abc
acb
bac
bca
cab
cba

test_cases.explanation: There are 2! = 2 permutations of the string "ab".

description:
Given a string S consisting of distinct lowercase English characters, write a recursive function to generate all possible permutations of the string.

Return the permutations in lexicographically sorted order.

Constraints:

1 ≤ |S| ≤ 8

All characters in S are unique.

Notes:

You must use recursion to solve this problem.

Iterative permutation generation is not allowed.

Output permutations as a list of strings.
